entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Kakabeka Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:18 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of rain or drizzle this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
